ingredients.raw: 250 g warm water (104ºF, 40ºC; in the summertime when the kitchen is warm, use room temp or cold water; read about desired dough temperature in my blog post FAQs)

expected.note: 104ºF, 40ºC; in the summertime when the kitchen is warm, use room temp or cold water; read about desired dough temperature in my blog post FAQs

ingredients.raw: 7 g instant yeast (I use 1 packet (7 g each) of Fleischmann’s® bread machine yeast; use every last granule; DO NOT use old yeast that‘s more than 6 months old; to substitute active dry yeast, use the same amount or up to 25% more and proof it first in some of the warm water from above)

expected.item: instant yeast (I use 1 packet (7 g each) of Fleischmann’s® bread machine yeast; use every last granule; DO NOT use old yeast that‘s more than 6 months old; to substitute active dry yeast, use the same amount or up to 25% more and proof it first in some of the warm water from above)

ingredients.raw: 350 g bread flour (I use King Arthur)
20 g skim milk powder or nonfat dry milk powder (I use Bob’s Red Mill; for vegan, use coconut milk powder; avoid soy milk powder as the dough does not rise well)

expected.item: skim milk powder or nonfat dry milk powder (I use Bob’s Red Mill; for vegan, use coconut milk powder; avoid soy milk powder as the dough does not rise well)

ingredients.raw: 25 g unsalted butter (at room temperature; for vegan, use Miyoko’s)

expected.note: at room temperature; for vegan, use Miyoko’s

ingredients.raw: ½ tsp neutral oil (for the bowl)
10 g unsalted butter (at room temperature; for the pan; or use cooking oil spray)

expected.note: at room temperature; for the pan; or use cooking oil spray
